      • withinBounds

        public static boolean withinBounds(int px,
                   int py,
                   int ax,
                   int ay,
                   int bx,
                   int by,
                   int cx,
                   int cy)
        Checks whether the specified point px, py is within the triangle defined by ax, ay, bx, by and cx, cy.
        Parameters:
        px - The x of the point to test
        py - The y of the point to test
        ax - The x of the 1st point of the triangle
        ay - The y of the 1st point of the triangle
        bx - The x of the 2nd point of the triangle
        by - The y of the 2nd point of the triangle
        cx - The x of the 3rd point of the triangle
        cy - The y of the 3rd point of the triangle
        Returns:
        true when the point is within the given triangle
